carrotaws:secure-shell-publish

Full name:

com.carrotgarden.maven:carrot-maven-aws-plugin:1.1.0-SNAPSHOT:secure-shell-publish

Description:

publish directory content via sftp from local to remote system

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: test.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: prepare-package.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
sshHost String - ssh host name
Default value is: builder.example.com.
sshKeyFile File - ssh key file
Default value is: ${user.home}/.amazon/ssh-key.pem.
sshSource String - ssh sftp source directory on local file system
Default value is: ./target/publish.
sshStatusSuccess Set - ssh run expected exit success status collection; such as
sshTarget String - ssh sftp target directory on remote file system
Default value is: /tmp/publish.
sshUser String - ssh user name
Default value is: ubuntu.

Parameter Details

sshHost:

ssh host name
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: builder.example.com

sshKeyFile:

ssh key file
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${user.home}/.amazon/ssh-key.pem

sshSource:

ssh sftp source directory on local file system
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ./target/publish

sshStatusSuccess:

ssh run expected exit success status collection; such as
  • Type: java.util.Set
  • Required: Yes

sshTarget:

ssh sftp target directory on remote file system
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: /tmp/publish

sshUser:

ssh user name
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ubuntu
